name: drivehr-netlify-sync
description: TypeScript-based Netlify serverless function that scrapes DriveHRIS job postings and syncs them to WordPress via REST API

scripts.lint: eslint 'src/**/*.ts' 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ No source files to lint yet'
scripts.lint:fix: eslint 'src/**/*.ts' --fix 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ No source files to lint yet'
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ No source files to type-check yet'
scripts.format: prettier --write 'src/**/*.ts' 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ No source files to format yet'
scripts.format:check: prettier --check 'src/**/*.ts' 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ No source files to check format yet'
